name: 3D Girl Princess Endless Run
description:
++++Join the Craze with this Smash-hit Game!!!+++++

Get more of your favorite princesses as you run, slide, jump, duck, dodge and skate your way through this FROZEN wonderland!!!
-------------------------------------------------
All New Game Features!!!
-Choose from Your 4 Favorite Characters!!
-Collect Coins and Power-ups!
-Dodge Obstacles and Flying Snowballs!!!
-Be the Princess of Your Dreams!!!
------------------------------------------------
"I love this game!!! It was fun to slide on the ice!" -C.K.

"I thought this game would be too easy, but it got harder as I went along and became super addicting!" -Kenzy A.

"This is definitely one of the best girl games out there!" -Mallory


Download TODAY and start the adventure!!!
